Trade/Device Name(s): GAL-1A Plus Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GAL-1A Plus Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood for home self-testing
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips, forearm, or palm; lay use by diabetics for monitoring, not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use, and for single patient use only
